item.title: Visa Europe: Blockchain is More Interesting than Bitcoin
item.description:
Visa Europe: Blockchain is More Interesting than Bitcoin

Transitioning from traditional payments to their mobile counterparts is quite a challenge, even for Visa Europe. Blockchain technology is of particular interest to this institution, similar to how a lot of banks are keen on distributed ledgers as well. Bitcoin enthusiasts are thoroughly convinced digital payments are the way forward.

item.title: Bitcoin Remittance App Abra Now Available In US
item.description:
Bitcoin Remittance App Abra Now Available In US

The Abra team has a plan to expand the availability of their mobile apps to different countries in the coming months Abra is a Bitcoin remittance application a lot of people seem to have high hopes for. Ever since the company raised money to bring their project to the masses, things had gone quiet.

item.title: Massive Chinese Trading Volume Pushes Bitcoin Price Upward
item.description:
Massive Chinese Trading Volume Pushes Bitcoin Price Upward

Bitcoin has been seeing an excellent price increase once again, after a few days of dips and sideways action. Mainly the Chinese market continues to dominate the trading volume, as they are inching towards 94% of all trades. Interestingly enough, there have been three days with nearly identical trading volume.

item.title: HashOcean: Another Cloud Mining Scam? - Bitcoin News
item.description:
HashOcean: Another Cloud Mining Scam? - Bitcoin News

In the world of cloud-based bitcoin mining, you never know what you are going to get. Most operators should be scrutinized and researched thoroughly before signing up as there are definitely some legitimate operations. However, there are quite a bit of shady practices as well in the cloud mining space.

item.title: Peerplays Open Sources Automated Blockchain-based Distribution Model
item.description:
Peerplays Open Sources Automated Blockchain-based Distribution Model

The Peerplays protocol is quite an interesting one to keep an eye on for any cryptocurrency enthusiast. This gaming platform has been focusing on using blockchain technology by creating an open-source fee sharing module. Any Graphene-based blockchain can distribute profits directly to its token holders.

item.title: Crooked Agent Caught Again: Lyn Ulbricht Speaks Out
item.description:
Crooked Agent Caught Again: Lyn Ulbricht Speaks Out

According to Also read: China to Play a 'Leading Role' in Bitcoin's Future recent Silk Road court documents unsealed on June 30, the corrupt special agent Shaun Bridges stole an extra $700,000 USD worth of Bitcoin that authorities were initially unaware of.

item.title: Lisk Adoption Growing as Currency Added to ShapeShift Exchange
item.description:
Lisk Adoption Growing as Currency Added to ShapeShift Exchange

Blockchain development platform Lisk now has its crypto-token LSK listed on ShapeShift, Yuanbao and CoinPayments.

item.title: Let's Talk Bitcoin! #299 The DAO and Plan B
item.description:
Let's Talk Bitcoin! #299 The DAO and Plan B

On Episode 299... A live Q&A session to discuss the latest developments in theDAO, Ethereum, the aborted soft-fork, the DoS vector that caused the soft-fork abort, the next steps (hard fork?) and the implications. Join Adam, Stephanie and Andreas and several guests for this live Q&A. Guests: Prof.

item.title: FortuneJack Launches LuckyJack, a Brand New Bitcoin Casino Game - NEWSBTC
item.description:
FortuneJack Launches LuckyJack, a Brand New Bitcoin Casino Game - NEWSBTC

July 1, 2016 Curacao - FortuneJack, the leading Bitcoin game platform has announced the launch of its new giveaway promo game, LuckyJack that offers free Bitcoins to the platform users. LuckyJack is a daily free Bitcoin giveaway promo by FortuneJack where the platform distributes up to 1000 mBTC prize fund every day to its registered players.
